SEARCH
Package com.greenloop.user_service.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.greenloop.user_service.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for user profile and interest management.

Handles user CRUD operations, profile updates, avatar changes, and interest tracking. All endpoints expect authenticated headers (X-User-ID, X-User-Email) injected by the gateway.

Base Path: /api/users

See Also:

    • createUser

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<UserResponse>> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreateUserRequest request, @RequestHeader("X-User-ID") String userId, @RequestHeader("X-User-Email") String userEmail)
      Creates a new user profile.
      Parameters:
      request - user profile details (username, birth date, avatar, bio)
      userId - authenticated user ID from gateway (X-User-ID header)
      userEmail - authenticated user email from gateway (X-User-Email header)
      Returns:
      newly created user profile wrapped in ApiResponse

    • getAllUsers

      Retrieves all user profiles.
      Returns:
      list of all users wrapped in ApiResponse

    • updateUserProfile

      @PutMapping("/profile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<UserResponse>> updateUserProfile(@RequestHeader("X-User-ID") String userId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateUserRequest request)
      Updates the authenticated user's profile (username, bio, birth date).
      Parameters:
      userId - authenticated user ID from gateway (X-User-ID header)
      request - partial update with non-null fields to modify
      Returns:
      updated user profile wrapped in ApiResponse

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@RequestHeader("X-User-ID") String userId)
      Deletes the authenticated user's profile permanently.
      Parameters:
      userId - authenticated user ID from gateway (X-User-ID header)
      Returns:

    • addInterests

      @PostMapping("/interests") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<UserInterestsResponse>> addInterests(@RequestHeader("X-User-ID") String userId, @RequestBody List<String> interests)
      Adds new interests to the user's profile.
      Parameters:
      userId - authenticated user ID from gateway (X-User-ID header)
      interests - list of interest strings (e.g., ["RECYCLING", "TREE_PLANTING"])
      Returns:
      updated user interests wrapped in ApiResponse
